response.overview: In the years before the Second World War, a tomboyish postulant at an Austrian abbey is hired as a governess in the home of a widowed naval captain with seven children, and brings a new love of life and music into the home.
response.tagline: The happiest sound in all the world!
response.title: The Sound of Music
